ISSUE.TITLE: js minification not working in version 4.40.3
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. In admin section enable javascript bundle and minification 2. Try open checkout page Error: Javascript not loading ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54327114/114916004-4dedab00-9df2-11eb-869b-8c97f249e9ef.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5614 Used explicitly provided tuple name instead use of implicit 'ItemX' properties

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Quick fix for #5615 Quick fix for https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5615 Can be useful, if anyone else have similar problem.
